title: The Bloody Road to Longevity - Novel Updates
author: 夜开花
description:
The great way is solitary ; the path uncharted involving immense difficulty.

The way ahead may be indiscernible ;my experiences illusory.

Thrice-born to return home; to rekindle the glory of yesteryears.

Relying on the strength of seventy-two skills to duel the entire three realms !

Stepping forward on the bloody road to longevity till all prostrate before my feet.

I wander blissfully free and unfettered !!!>
